name: Association of European Refrigeration Component Manufacturers .
goal: ASERCOM, the Association of European Component Manufacturers is the platform for dealing with scientific and technical topics and their challenges, promoting standards for performance rating, methods of testing and product safety, focusing on improved environmental protection, serving the refrigeration and air conditioning industry and its customers.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment
euInitiatives:
F-gas regulation
ecodesign regulations related to HVAC/R equipment
circular economy
